item.title: About Me
item.description: ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to my blog! My name is Thibault, and if you’re here, it’s probably because, like me, you’re interested in data science and computer science. I’m currently in my final year of engineering school, specializing in applied mathematics and modelingâ€”fields that fuel my curiosity and my desire to understand the world around us. Why this blog? This blog is a space where I share my personal projects in data science and computer science.
